div.class: Header js-details-container Details flex-wrap flex-md-nowrap p-responsive
Header-item Header-item--full js-site-search flex-column flex-md-row width-full flex-order-2 flex-md-order-none mr-0 mr-md-3 mt-3 mt-md-0 Details-content--hidden-not-important d-md-flex
header-search flex-self-stretch flex-md-self-auto mr-0 mr-md-3 mb-3 mb-md-0

ul.class: d-flex d-md-none px-3 mb-2 pagehead-actions float-none

span.span: Embed this gist in your website.

div.class: file-info pr-4 d-flex flex-md-items-center flex-items-start flex-order-1 flex-auto
Box-body p-0 blob-wrapper data type-xml gist-border-0

div.span: This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters

span.aria-label: This line has hidden Unicode characters

tr.td: This is a very very simple xml document.

div.class: file-info pr-4 d-flex flex-md-items-center flex-items-start flex-order-1 flex-auto
Box-body p-0 blob-wrapper data type-xslt gist-border-0

div.span: This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters

span.aria-label: This line has hidden Unicode characters

td.span: <!-- WARNING! With versions of mod-xslt < 1.4.3, you need to use

tr.td: <li>Get parameter (id, try to get this page with ?id=testidorsomething):

dialog.class: Overlay Overlay-whenNarrow Overlay--size-medium Overlay--motion-scaleFade Overlay--placement-bottom-whenNarrow js-saved-reply-container Overlay--disableScroll

tab-container.div: There was an error creating your Gist.

textarea.name: comment[body]
textarea.class: js-comment-field js-paste-markdown js-task-list-field js-quick-submit FormControl-textarea CommentBox-input js-size-to-fit size-to-fit js-session-resumable

div.class: rounded-bottom-2 bad-file repository-required Banner flash Banner--error flash-error Banner--full flash-full border-bottom-0

div.p: We don’t support that file type.
Try again with GIF, JPEG, JPG, MOV, MP4, PNG, SVG or WEBM.

div.class: rounded-bottom-2 bad-permissions Banner flash Banner--error flash-error Banner--full flash-full border-bottom-0

div.p: Attaching documents requires write permission to this repository.
Try again with GIF, JPEG, JPG, MOV, MP4, PNG, SVG or WEBM.

div.class: rounded-bottom-2 too-big js-upload-too-big Banner flash Banner--error flash-error Banner--full flash-full border-bottom-0
rounded-bottom-2 empty Banner flash Banner--error flash-error Banner--full flash-full border-bottom-0

div.p: Try again with a file that’s not empty.

div.class: rounded-bottom-2 hidden-file Banner flash Banner--error flash-error Banner--full flash-full border-bottom-0
rounded-bottom-2 failed-request Banner flash Banner--error flash-error Banner--full flash-full border-bottom-0

div.p: Something went really wrong, and we can’t process that file.

span.span: Paste, drop, or click to add files

footer.class: footer pt-8 pb-6 f6 color-fg-muted p-responsive

svg.class: octicon octicon-check js-clipboard-check-icon color-fg-success d-none m-2
